summary: The diff summary is truncated and does not show any changes to the new-user provisioning flow or routine seeding logic in backend/main.mo. There is also an unrelated modification to project_state.json. Based on the provided evidence, the onboarding routine seeding requirements are not verifiably implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: On first user registration only, seed 3 routine items in Morning Routine (section=#top) and 3 in Evening Routine (section=#bottom) as normal routine items that are not auto-recreated on later logins.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet for backend/main.mo does not include the new-user creation/provisioning branch or any routine-item seeding logic; therefore this behavior is not evidenced as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Seed the exact six English onboarding routine texts (3 morning, 3 evening including "Swipe + up... it's shy") on first registration.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet does not show any of the specified strings being added anywhere in backend/main.mo; no evidence of exact-text seeding is present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure deterministic ordering of seeded routine items within each section by assigning increasing order values (e.g., START_OFFSET, 2*START_OFFSET, 3*START_OFFSET).
missing_requirements.reason: Although START_OFFSET appears in backend/main.mo, the diff snippet does not show it being used to set routine-item order for seeded onboarding items; deterministic seeding order is not evidenced.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state update in project_state.json unrelated to onboarding routine seeding.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest constraints emphasize backend changes in backend/main.mo for onboarding seeding and does not request updates to project_state.json; this change is not requested by the spec.
